title.description: short title to use in selection box

common.title: Common
common.description: settings common to all items in this scenario

L.description: minimum price for zi Agent price generation

H.description: maximum price for zi Agent price generation

silent.description: false emits more console.log messages, true suppresses

buyerRate.description: Individual Buyer Poisson Arrival Rate (bids/sec per agent)

sellerRate.description: Individual Seller Poisson Arrival Rate (asks/sec per agent)

buyerAgentType.description: Buyer Types to use in rotation when creating buyers

sellerAgentType.description: Seller Types to use in rotation when creating sellers

keepPreviousOrders.description: true causes agents to not request cancellation/replacement of old orders with their new order, keeping the old orders.  Setting true will lead to setlement issues with zi traders; false submits 'cancel/replace' orders which first clear orders from the same agent

ignoreBudgetConstraint.description: false uses Marginal Cost / Marginal Value as limits for zi Agent random asks/bids; true ignores MC/MV and generates random asks/bids on [minPrice,maxPrice]

xMarket.title: advanced configuration options for X market

buySellBookLimit.description: 0 = unlimited; otherwise, truncates buy book and sell book after each trade to N orders each side

resetAfterEachTrade.description: reset the market, eliminating old orders, after each trade. use this, not buySellBookLimit, to completely clear books after each trade

buyImprove.description: 0=off, no effect; 1=reject new buy orders priced less than or equal best buy order; 2=reject new orders that are priced lt or eq 2nd best buy order; ...

sellImprove.description: 0=off, no effect; 1=reject new sell orders priced greater than or equal best sell order; 2 = reject new orders priced gt or eq 2nd best sell order; ...
